notesStmt.note: The first and the last page nearly illegible. One leaf cancelled after folio 8, and two leaves after folio 71. No lacunae in the text.
Censored by Renato da Modena: inscribed with his name, 1626 (folio ); see 132-133.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile his manuscript no. 66; his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum through Asher & Co. in October 1865 for £1,000 through Adolphus Asher (b. 1800, d. 1853), Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum (see 131-153: inscribed (folio [81v]).
